data.title: John Marvin Kalleward Sr. Obituary & Funeral
data.meta_description: Passed away Sunday August 14, 2005 at his residence. John was born June 4, 1949 in Kalamazoo the son of Marvin and Cordelia (Bennink) Kalleward and had been a lifelong resident in the
data.text: Passed away Sunday August 14, 2005 at his residence. John was born June 4, 1949 in Kalamazoo the son of Marvin and Cordelia (Bennink) Kalleward and had been a lifelong resident in the Kalamazoo area. John was employed with the Kalleward Group as Job Site Superintendent for many years. He was a member of the LifeSpring Church and a former member of Bethany Reformed Church where he served as a Deacon. He enjoyed various activities with his family which included go-karting and coaching hockey. On January 12, 1988 he was united in marriage to the former Carrie Dunn who survives. Also surviving are 4 sons, John Marvin, Jr. and fianc√©e Jennifer Swartz, William Evert, Sr. (Dianna), Robert John (Tina), and Curtis John; 6 grandchildren, Samuel, William Jr., Courtnie, Chelsea, Jesse, and Robby; sister and brothers, Judy (James) Wahl, James (Tonia) Kalleward, Gary (Linda) Kalleward; several nieces and nephews; and his former wife, Carol Fricke. A memorial service will be held at 1:00 o'clock Thursday at the Langeland Family Funeral Homes, Westside Chapel, 3926 South 9th St. with Pastor Mark Payne officiating. A gathering of family and friends will be Wednesday evening from 5-8pm at the Westside Chapel. Private interment of cremains will be held at a later date. Memorials may be directed to the Kalamazoo Loaves and Fishes.
